replies.body:
So, not going to comment on the situation of AP right now, but it's not really accurate to call the crit item changes on PBE right now all nerfs.

Some stuff is getting nerfed, yes, but in return, they are much more affordable, which means that crit ADCs will actually be able to meaningfully participate in the game before they are full build.

I will gladly take a 10 AD and 5% AD-TD conversion nerf on IE for less gold costs on zeal items and not overcapping on crit chance.

Its not a nerf at all. .-. Its less AD/TD but a better build path(Pickax instead of two BF swords is SO much better) and cheaper(by like a decent chunk of gold); it will be a weaker item but it will feel less problematic for ADC's to build and the lowering of True Damage will also mean Tanks might have an opportunity to come back. :) The less crit chance is also a buff; it means you can cleanly get 100% crit off of two zeal items now without any over cap, especially since they lowered the cost of the items in general. At worse, this is a net neutral, which I will take. It'll make playing ADC's and their build paths feel far less punishing.
It's actually a buff since the items are cheaper
The items are being made more affordable.  Yasuo is actually going to get a lot out of this.

The fact brand heimer and swain havent seen any actual nerfs so far is disgusting.

"but swain got nerf" No, it was a placebo joke nerf that didnt even move his wr, hes still broken as shit bot lane.
